mapper.sql: serialNo, billNo, proposalCode, projectCode, projectName, num, medicalPrice, ruleName, deductPrice, deductReason, repaymentReason, doctorName, deptCode, deptName, enterHospitalDate, outHospitalDate, costDate,enterHospitalDateStr,outHospitalDateStr,costDateStr, hospitalizedNo, treatmentMode, settlementDate,settlementDateStr, personalNo, insuredName, cardNumber, areaName, versionNumber, backAppeal, typeno, applyDate, applyDateStr, operatorId, operatorName, id, applyDataId, verifyDoctorCode, verifyDoctorName, verifyDeptCode, verifyDeptName, operateReason, operateDate, matchPersonId, matchPersonName, matchDate, reviewerId, reviewerName, reviewerDate, sendPersonId, sendPersonName, sendDate,insuredType,dataType,orderNumber, COMMENTS, STATE, IS_DELETEMARK, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID
mapper.update:
update yb_reconsider_verify_view
serialNo=#{serialNo}, billNo=#{billNo}, proposalCode=#{proposalCode}, projectCode=#{projectCode}, projectName=#{projectName}, num=#{num}, medicalPrice=#{medicalPrice}, ruleName=#{ruleName}, deductPrice=#{deductPrice}, deductReason=#{deductReason}, repaymentReason=#{repaymentReason}, doctorName=#{doctorName}, deptCode=#{deptCode}, deptName=#{deptName}, enterHospitalDate=#{enterHospitalDate}, outHospitalDate=#{outHospitalDate}, costDate=#{costDate}, hospitalizedNo=#{hospitalizedNo}, treatmentMode=#{treatmentMode}, settlementDate=#{settlementDate}, personalNo=#{personalNo}, insuredName=#{insuredName}, cardNumber=#{cardNumber}, areaName=#{areaName}, versionNumber=#{versionNumber}, backAppeal=#{backAppeal}, typeno=#{typeno}, applyDate=#{applyDate}, applyDateStr=#{applyDateStr}, operatorId=#{operatorId}, operatorName=#{operatorName}, id=#{id}, applyDataId=#{applyDataId}, verifyDoctorCode=#{verifyDoctorCode}, verifyDoctorName=#{verifyDoctorName}, verifyDeptCode=#{verifyDeptCode}, verifyDeptName=#{verifyDeptName}, operateReason=#{operateReason}, operateDate=#{operateDate}, matchPersonId=#{matchPersonId}, matchPersonName=#{matchPersonName}, matchDate=#{matchDate}, reviewerId=#{reviewerId}, reviewerName=#{reviewerName}, reviewerDate=#{reviewerDate}, sendPersonId=#{sendPersonId}, sendPersonName=#{sendPersonName}, sendDate=#{sendDate}, COMMENTS=#{comments}, STATE=#{state}, IS_DELETEMARK=#{isDeletemark}, MODIFY_TIME=#{modifyTime}, CREATE_TIME=#{createTime}, CREATE_USER_ID=#{createUserId}, MODIFY_USER_ID=#{modifyUserId},
mapper.select: select count(*) from yb_reconsider_verify rv INNER JOIN yb_reconsider_apply_data ad ON ad.id = rv.applyDataId and ad.IS_DELETEMARK = 1 INNER JOIN yb_reconsider_apply ra ON ra.id = ad.pid and ra.IS_DELETEMARK = 1 WHERE rv.IS_DELETEMARK = 1 and ra.applyDateStr= #{applyDate} and ad.dataType = #{dataType} and case when ra.state = 3 then ad.typeno = 1 when ra.state >= 5 then ad.typeno IN(1,2) else 1=2 end
